result.purpose: Defines various enums and types related to quest management in a gaming application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing enums and types related to quest functionality into separate files for maintainability and clarity.

internal/enums/quest_center/action_v2.go.purpose: Defines quest action enums for a gaming application.

internal/enums/quest_center/event.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for event statuses in the quest center.

internal/enums/quest_center/log_param.go.purpose: Defines and manages log parameter types for quest-related functionality.

internal/enums/quest_center/op_action_v2.purpose: Defines operation actions for quest management in an enum format.

internal/enums/quest_center/quest_pool.g.purpose: Defines quest pool tiers and provides utility functions for handling them.

internal/enums/quest_center/quest_status.purpose: Defines quest status enums and a state machine for managing quest states.

internal/enums/quest_center/reward.go.purpose: Defines enums for reward distribution and resource types with associated methods.

internal/enums/quest_center/user.go.purpose: Defines user types for a quest center and provides utility functions for handling them.

internal/enums/quest_center/user_quest_v.purpose: Defines user quest status enums and related functionalities for a quest system.

internal/enums/quest_center/user_reward_.purpose: Defines user reward statuses and provides methods for handling them.

internal/enums/quest_center/user_tier.go.purpose: Defines user tiers for a quest system and provides methods for handling them.
